同様: (douyou) - idêntico, igual a, mesmo (tipo), como, similaridade
同様に: (どうように) - identically; in the (exact) same way; similarly
同権: (どうけん) - the same rights; equal rights
同歯性: (どうしせい) - (ant: 異歯性) homodont
同母姉: (どうぼし) - sisters of the same mother; uterine sisters
同氏: (doushi) - a referida pessoa, ele, ela; mesmo sobrenome
同気: (どうき) - same temperament; same turn of mind
同気相求む: (どうきあいもとむ) - like minds gather
同気相求める: (どうきあいもとめる) - like minds gather
同法: (どうほう) - same law; same method
同流: (どうりゅう) - the same style; same school; common origin
同点ゴール: (どうてんゴール) - equalizing goal; equalizer
同点決勝戦: (どうてんけっしょうせん) - tiebreaker
同然: (どうぜん) - similar to; same; right; proper; just; natural
同率: (どうりつ) - the same ratio or percentage
同田貫: (どうたぬき) - Eiroku-period swordsmithing school, named for a place in the old Higo province; sword of the Dotanuki school, usually thicker and heavier than regular Japanese swords; in fiction, a heavier variant of Japanese sword
同町: (どうちょう) - the same town; that town
同病相哀れむ: (どうびょうあいあわれむ) - fellow sufferers pity each other
同病相憐れむ: (どうびょうあいあわれむ) - fellow sufferers pity each other
同盟休校: (どうめいきゅうこう) - student strike
同盟国: (どうめいこく) - ally (of another nation)
同盟怠業: (どうめいたいぎょう) - go-slow strike
同盟条約: (どうめいじょうやく) - treaty of alliance
同相: (どうそう) - the said (cabinet) minister; in-phase (component of a wave); homeomorphism
同相分除去: (どうそうぶんじょきょ) - common mode rejection
同相電圧: (どうそうでんあつ) - common mode voltage
同省: (どうしょう) - the said ministry; the same ministry
同着: (どうちゃく) - arriving at the same moment
同程度: (どうていど) - same level; same extent
同種同文: (どうしゅどうぶん) - same race and same language
同種計算機ネットワーク: (どうしゅけいさんきネットワーク) - homogeneous computer network
同種類: (どうしゅるい) - the same kind
同穴: (どうけつ) - being buried in the same grave
同窓会: (dousoukai) - associação de formandos, encontro de ex-alunos, reunião de turma
同窓生: (どうそうせい) - alumni; alumnus; schoolmate
同等: (doutou) - igualdade, igual, mesmos direitos, mesma posição, equivalência
同系色: (どうけいしょく) - similar color; similar colour
同級: (どうきゅう) - the same grade; same class
同罪: (どうざい) - same offense; same offence
同署: (dousho) - the (acima mencionado) authorities, police (from said station)
同翅類: (どうしるい) - homopterans (true bugs of suborder Homoptera)
同職: (どうしょく) - the same occupation; the said occupation
同胞融和: (どうほうゆうわ) - movement to end discrimination against Burakumin
同腹: (どうふく) - born of the same mother; kindred spirits
同船: (どうせん) - the same ship; taking the same ship
同色: (どうしょく) - same color; same colour
同行: (どうこう) - accompanying/travelling together/traveling together; same bank
同行二人: (どうぎょうににん) - Kobo Daishi is always with me (written on the hats of Shikoku pilgrims)
同行者: (どうこうしゃ) - fellow travellers; fellow travelers
同衾: (どうきん) - sleeping together; sleeping with; sharing a bed
同訓異字: (どうくんいじ) - different kanji with the same Japanese reading (and usu. a similar meaning)
同調: (どうちょう) - sympathy; agreement with; alignment; conformity; tuning
同調圧力: (どうちょうあつりょく) - pressure to conform; peer pressure
同調者: (どうちょうしゃ) - fellow traveler; fellow traveller; sympathizer; sympathiser
同質: (どうしつ) - same quality; same nature; homogeneous
